title: I'm in Japan and don't know what to do for my server...
body:
Ok, so me and a bunch of my friends live in Japan because we support the United States Military over here, and used to be able to play on the NA servers with a ping of around 120-150 which isn't great, but def playable. I've tried OCE server and my ping is around 180-200 which is borderline unplayable.

I love this game and have thrown quite a bit of money at it. But since the servers moved, this game is basically unplayable. This game can be frustrating even with a zero ping... Since the servers have moved, I now have an NA server ping of about 180-200. I don't know what to do. I can't play on Korea Servers because you need a KSN (Korean Serial Number like our SSN in USA), just to make an account or get on their servers. I'm on a gig fiber connection and have awesome internet, but all servers I've got access to are just to bad to play on. Any help is greatly appreciated.
